item.title: Game Level (Map) Editor - Version 1
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:24, topic:330672”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=427045.msg3136849#msg3136849 date=1267065828]
I’ll say, this does impress me a bit. If you ever work on starting a 3D game, im getting ready to go into college for it, and i could use the practice.
[/quote]
I have yet to scratch the surface of 3D model loading. I read a very small tutorial on it, but hardly learned anything.[/quote]

Aah, im getting ready to go in for a bachelors in ‘Game Object/Weapon Design’, will be 3 years of college though because i’ll only be taking my core classes.

BTW, i will try to make ya a couple maps, see what i can come up with.

Read full topic

item.title: Game Level (Map) Editor - Version 1
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Lin:

Sorry, I meant learn the math to crop the needed tiles and allow customization.

Oh, I could do that. But personally I would create a new program to edit the tiles/create tile sets.

Fat Cookies:

http://mapeditor.org/

Thats epic. Is it for a game? Also, was it made by a team, or just one person?

[quote=“Frell, post:16, topic:330672”]Game then map editor. Many people work the opposite way.

Btw lin is the master of map editors.[/quote]
I’m the opposite type

It’s easier to do when using a more visual language. Java is not visual at all

Read full topic

item.title: Game Level (Map) Editor - Version 1
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:12, topic:330672”]As an extended response, this program is pretty useless. You need to learn math and allow users to use custom tilesets. Atleast then it can be used to design maps for a certain game for future use. Here’s something I made a long time ago. It shows two things you should add to your tool.
[im]http://img535.imageshack.us/img535/5773/mm1.png[/img][/quote]
If you read, you would see that I AM working on a game for it, just not done.

Also, I don’t have enough tiles for tile set feature to be much of use, and I doubt with the type of game it is would even have any use.
And what is the other feature you said it could show? And what do you mean ‘learn math’?

Read full topic

item.title: Game Level (Map) Editor - Version 1
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

As an extended response, this program is pretty useless. You need to learn math and allow users to use custom tilesets. Atleast then it can be used to design maps for a certain game for future use. Here’s something I made a long time ago. It shows two things you should add to your tool.

Read full topic
